metadata.synopsis: One-liner and HasMet for the vampire book club member03 in the Park. Its a vampire book club as in they read vampire books. They aren't vampires. Probably.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to one of the book club members in the CTY_Main_A Park at coords -92, 30, -50

0.speaker: Morgan
0.text: Oh do leave me be, we're about to get to the good bit of the discussion!

1.speaker: Morgan
1.text: Hang on, hang on, don't distract me! I've been waiting a bloody month to talk about this book.

2.speaker: Morgan
2.text: You killed them - those people! In the robes! How thrilling...
